React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Container,Typography,Table,TableBody,TableCell,TableContainer,TableHead,TableRow,Paper,Button,Dialog,DialogTitle,DialogContent,DialogActions,TextField,IconButton,Box}from"@mui/material";import EditIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Edit";import DeleteIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Delete";import AddIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Add";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Courses=()=>{const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);const[open,setOpen]=useState(false);const[currentCourse,setCurrentCourse]=useState({title:"",description:"",instructor:"",duration:"",pointsValue:100});const[isEdit,setIsEdit]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{fetchCourses();},[]);const fetchCourses=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL}/api/courses`);const data=await response.json();setCourses(data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching courses:",error);}};const handleOpen=function(){let course=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;if(course){setCurrentCourse(course);setIsEdit(true);}else{setCurrentCourse({title:"",description:"",instructor:"",duration:"",pointsValue:100});setIsEdit(false);}setOpen(true);};const handleClose=()=>{setOpen(false);};const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setCurrentCourse(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=async()=>{try{const url=isEdit?`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL}/api/courses/${currentCourse._id}`:`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL}/api/courses`;const method=isEdit?"PUT":"POST";const response=await fetch(url,{method,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(currentCourse)});if(response.ok){fetchCourses();handleClose();}}catch(error){console.error("Error saving course:",error);}};const handleDelete=async id=>{try{const response=await fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL}/api/courses/${id}`,{method:"DELETE"});if(response.ok){fetchCourses();}}catch(error){console.error("Error deleting Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddIcon,{}),onClick:()=>handleOpen(),children:"Add Course"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableContainer,{component:Paper,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHead,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Instructor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Duration Value"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{children:courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:course.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableCell,{children:[course.description.substring(0,50),"..."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:course.instructor}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:course.duration}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:course.pointsValue}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableCell,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:()=>handleOpen(course),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditIcon,{color:"primary"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:()=>handleDelete(course._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteIcon,{color:"error"})})]})]},course._id))})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dialog,{open:open,onClose:handleClose,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogTitle,{children:isEdit?"Edit Course":"Add New Course"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DialogContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{margin:"dense",name:"title",label:"Title",type:"text",fullWidth:true,variant:"standard",value:currentCourse.title,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{margin:"dense",name:"description",label:"Description",type:"text",fullWidth:true,variant:"standard",multiline:true,rows:4,value:currentCourse.description,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{margin:"dense",name:"instructor",label:"Instructor",type:"text",fullWidth:true,variant:"standard",value:currentCourse.instructor,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{margin:"dense",name:"duration",label:"Duration Value",type:"number",fullWidth:true,variant:"standard",value:currentCourse.pointsValue,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DialogActions,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleClose,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleSubmit,color:"primary",children:isEdit?"Update":"Save"})]})]})]});};export default Courses;
